text: Do not visit this branch for day to day banking activities if you opened your account in Thailand.  This branch has no affiliation with the Thai arm of Bangkok Bank!  Don’t waste your time even looking for an ATM,  they don’t have one.

Bangkok Bank Building is a 17-storey commercial building, and is the headquarter of Bangkok bank. The commercial space available is mainly for office rental and sale. The building has a very good office layout with maximum and efficient use of office space. It is also equipped with basic amenities. It is of 6 mins walk from Telok Ayer MRT via Cross St and Cecil St, 5-10 mins walk from Raffles Place MRT.
You can't use Thai card here, also no ATMs
Quite old design but great location
Customer service way of speaking is not polite and is rude
